answer: All vehicles parked on campus must display a valid UAH parking permit. Permits can be purchased online via the UAH Parking Portal. Visitor parking is available in designated areas.
Charger ID cards are issued at the Charger Card Office located in the Charger Union. Bring a valid government-issued ID.
Tuition payments can be made online through the UAH Student Account Center or in person at the Bursar's Office in the Student Services Building.
The last day to drop a class varies by semester. Check the Academic Calendar for specific dates.
Students should connect to the 'UAH' Wi-Fi network using their Charger ID credentials.
Salmon Library is generally open Monday–Thursday 7:30am–10pm, Friday 7:30am–6pm, Saturday 10am–6pm, and Sunday 1pm–10pm. Hours vary by semester.
In any emergency, call UAH Police at (256) 824-6596 or dial 911. UAH also uses RAVE Alerts for campus emergencies.
Advising offices are located in Morton Hall. Contact your college’s advising office to schedule an appointment.
Submit the FAFSA at fafsa.gov, then review your aid package in your UAH student account. The Financial Aid Office is located in the Student Services Building.
Students are expected to uphold UAH’s Code of Student Conduct, which includes academic integrity, respect, and community responsibility.
